items.sentence: This book hasn\'t yet been translated into French.
Tom asked Mary to teach him how to play the flute.
Tom asked Mary what her plans for the future were.
Tom asked Mary what kind of food she liked to eat.
Tom asked Mary what time she expected to get home.
Tom asked Mary whether she planned to swim or not.
Tom asked me for more money than he really needed.
I can\'t tell you how many times I\'ve been there.
I can\'t understand what you\'re trying to get at.
There are a few apples on the tree, aren\'t there?
My advice to you is to forget about what happened.
My brother went to the United States to study law.
My father planted this tree on the day I was born.
My father sometimes goes to Australia on business.
My father usually watches television after dinner.
You haven\'t told Tom you\'re an ex-con, have you?
You know who Tom\'s French teacher is, don\'t you?
Tom knew that Mary was John and Alice\'s daughter.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t going to do that today.
Mary is Catholic, but her boyfriend is an atheist.
